dict.string: We need access to save photos to your library
We need access to the camera to take photos
We use Face ID to enhance security
We need your location to show it on the map
We need your location to show it on the map
We need access to your microphone to record audio
This app uses speech recognition to convert your speech to text.
This app uses Bluetooth to connect to nearby devices for enhanced functionality.
We need to update your health data.
We need to access your health data to provide personalized insights.
